topics.body:
When I get my exam results, I will do either 2 things.

If I do bad, I will be inactive for two days here.
If I do good, I will smoke a cigar.

I have a lot of cigars, actually and I don't even smoke.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8a67e6368722fa7e32a00#post_54e8a67e6368722fa7e32a00
I don't like sleeping naked. It feels like an angel is sleeping with me.
And that is creepy.

I prefer sleeping in shorts and long sleeved shirts.

topics.body: So the abomination that is Fifty Shades of Grey got me thinking about something. Are there any portrayals of a BDSM couple that aren't completely mind-numbingly bad? And then I remembered one manga that I read awhile back. "It's called Nana to Kaoru":http://www.mangahere.co/manga/nana_to_kaoru/. This series is the most positive portrayal of BDSM I have ever seen. Showing not as sexual deviance but as stress relief and an exercise in trust. Now be warned the manga is SUPER NSFW. But it's still very VERY good!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8ae9763687273490c2000#post_54e8ae9763687273490c2000
Hmmm? now that's a new one.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8af24636872106b6d0000#post_54e8af24636872106b6d0000
Trust me. I know you're thinking "Well this is just porn" but it isn't. The length the author goes to in exploring Kaoru and Nana's relationship as dom and sub is really enlightening.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8af9c6368726dbbfa1d00#post_54e8af9c6368726dbbfa1d00
Oh I'm not thinking its porn. I just think that's pretty interesting.

To see the more emotional prospective of something like this more than the, well, "Naughty" side.

Its true, a good story shouldn't be brought down solely on peoples minds LITERALLY being in the gutter as some would say.

If thousands of people payed to see the abomination that is 50 shades of grey they should at least give a GOOD story on the subject a try. 

You survived sex-ed class, be a big boy and think of the situation with more of an open mind.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8b1ec6368722bac6b0800#post_54e8b1ec6368722bac6b0800
I have been around many adults in my life to know how people should and shouldn't act. I have a lot of older friends like you guys!

Plus Been around some pretty mean spirited people to know I shouldn't re-enact their mistakes. 

I've witness racists, sexists, all of it including people with minds as open minded as a tight can of pickles.

So I have learned not to be like that and there for see things in a better way, an open way. 

So basically I have learned to not be an ass! 

~Also thank you!~
